body:
To G3, the author of this work.
I see. Well, you have the right to stop or put any water mark you like to try and avoid this being published and uploaded in other places, but this is how internet works, and is not like me or other people will look into less known pages even if we are hooked into the story.
Good luck with whatever proyect you have next then. This was weird, but somehow fun.

I am G3, the author of this work. I'm worried about such unauthorized publication, so I can't draw the next work. 
我是 G3，這部作品的作者。 我擔心這種未經授權的出版，所以我不能畫下一個作品。
